Guys, I'm sorry, but they'll be no more ups. Machine is down.

And, to be quite honest, since I'm not feeling how folks are talking about me (https://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7561050/) while I'm out of commission, I'll never be back here. (too much drama in my offline life to read reckless bs about me online).

I never expected anything out of this -- I did it because it was fun, I love movies, had a spare machine, and know a little bit more about compression than the average man -- but now that the fun is gone, and the machine is dead, the ride's is over.

Since most of you have been kind enough to support with positive comments (and seed, hopefully), I figured I at least owed you a sign-off message.

Oh man.. that sucks, some people are really ungreatfull. You were doin' a fenomenal job!

Thank you for all the effort you put in for us..

Are you still release the guide?

Thats not right of them.. you really have been a great help to most of us. sorry you want to leave. 

Thanks for your time.

You should ignore the disses out there and not them bother you!  I really enjoy watching all of your posts for the quality and size of the rips!  You have to take the negative comments with a grain of salt!  Uploaders like axxo, secretmyth, lifechanger, etc. got them all the time!  You can't please everyone!  I hope you reconsider and continue posting for the masses in the BT community that love your stuff!!!

Wow, really sad to hear you won't be uploading! Too bad your machine is dead. 

But I'd like to thank you for the great uploads! You've got great work and I have enjoyed it very much. I will most certainly miss your work. I remember when I found your Uploads, I was quite happy!

I am surprised though, didn't think you'd take the negative comments to heart. You should know better.

One thing I don't understand is why the uploaders don't have some kind of donating account. I would love to give back you guys. It's the least we could 

Well, Thank you very much! I will always check to see if you're back, one can only hope.
